tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE indie_game_feedback (id INT, player_name VARCHAR(50), game_title VARCHAR(100), feedback TEXT, rating INT);

CREATE TABLE player_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  game_id INT,
  rating FLOAT,
  feedback_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE game_reviews (
  review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  game_id INT,
  review_text TEXT,
  review_date DATE,
  reviewer_name VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE game_reviews (
    review_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    game_id INT,
    player_name VARCHAR(50),
    review_text TEXT,
    rating INT
);
CREATE TABLE Game (game_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_title VARCHAR(255), release_date DATE, genre VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE Player (player_id INT PRIMARY KEY, player_name VARCHAR(100), email VARCHAR(255), country VARCHAR(50), join_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE Feedback (feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_id INT, player_id INT, rating INT, comment TEXT, feedback_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE Review (review_id INT PRIMARY KEY, game_id INT, player_id INT, review_text TEXT, review_date DATE)
